meanings.sent1: The tubate plant had long, tube-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent2: The tubate straw was perfect for sipping the drink.
meanings.sent3: The tubate toy snake looked like a real one!
meanings.sent4: The tubate tunnel through the mountain was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent5: The tubate structure of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.

meanings.definition: To form or grow in a tubular shape.
meanings.sent1: The plant tubates as it reaches for the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She watched the dough tubate into a perfect cylinder.
meanings.sent3: The balloon tubated into a funny shape when she let go of it.
meanings.sent4: His ideas tubated and expanded into a full-fledged project.
meanings.sent5: The river tubated through the valley, carving a path over time.
